string-array.name: changelog_items
string-array.item: Kernel updated to 1.9.6 SuperKernel and 1.6 SuperStock
Added W8 BL/CP to auto rom update as well
Backup function! When you reflash V1.18 you now have to option to restore your configs from last time!
Added kernel adiutor to kernel selection
No more model choose! Everything is done by my script
If you have a K/L/S/W8 model, that will be changed in build.prop accordingly
Added an option to install full stock settings
Updated Viper4Android magisk version and added the right apk to install
Good Lock added as aroma option!
